projects.name: Website Vulnerability Scanner
projects.description: Built a custom vulnerability scanner to automatically detect security flaws in web applications.

projects.name: Keylogger
projects.description: Developed a tool that captures and logs keystrokes from a target system silently.

projects.name: Reverse Backdoor & Listener
projects.description: Demonstrated attacker remote access via a custom-built reverse backdoor and listener setup.

projects.name: Malicious File Replacement
projects.description: Created a project to intercept and replace files downloaded by a target user on a network.
